name: Star Clicker Tycoon
description:
A game made for the 2022 Kenney jam (Theme: growth)   in under 48 hours! The objective is to infinitely grow the economy and your wealth!

 All visual assets are made by Kenney, the game was  designed and coded by me and the SFX and music were also created by me during the jam! A comment/any feedback would be appreciated as this was my first game jam! Instructions are available within the game.
